auto wlan0: auto wlan0   means bring the device up at boot, if you remove the auto line, it will be down at boot and you will have to manually bring it up
if you add:   auto wlan0     iface wlan0 inet dhcp
it will use dhcp and not be managable from network manager (not sure about ESSIDs etc)
ESSIDs are managed by wpa_supplicant IMHO
